001package andesite.player;
002
003import javax.annotation.CheckReturnValue;
004import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
005
006public interface MixerPlayer extends BasePlayer {
007    /**
008     * Returns the player that owns the mixer this player belongs to.
009     *
010     * @return The owner of this player.
011     */
012    @Nonnull
013    @CheckReturnValue
014    AndesitePlayer parentPlayer();
015    
016    /**
017     * Returns the key used for registering this player in the mixer.
018     *
019     * @return The key of this player.
020     */
021    @Nonnull
022    @CheckReturnValue
023    String key();
024    
025    /**
026     * Returns the mixer this player belongs to.
027     *
028     * @return The mixer this player belongs to.
029     */
030    @Nonnull
031    @CheckReturnValue
032    default AndesiteTrackMixer mixer() {
033        return parentPlayer().mixer();
034    }
035}
